scripts.pretest: npm i && npm run lint && npm run dep-check
scripts.bundle-qasm: browserify packages/qiskit-qasm/index.js -p [ browserify-banner --file dist/banner.txt ] -s qiskitQasm > dist/qiskit-qasm.js
scripts.bundle-sim: browserify packages/qiskit-sim/index.js -p [ browserify-banner --file dist/banner.txt ] -s qiskitSim > dist/qiskit-sim.js
scripts.bundle-cloud: browserify packages/qiskit-cloud/index.js -p [ browserify-banner --file dist/banner.txt ] -s QiskitCloud > dist/qiskit-cloud.js
scripts.bundle-algos: browserify packages/qiskit-algos/index.js -p [ browserify-banner --file dist/banner.txt ] -s qiskitAlgos > dist/qiskit-algos.js
scripts.bundle: npm run bundle-qasm && npm run bundle-sim && npm run bundle-cloud && npm run bundle-algos
